name: CerioliOutlierDetection
tagline: R package to detect multivariate outliers using robust Mahalanobis distances and the methodology of Cerioli (2010).
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This is the GitHub repository for the R package "CerioliOutlierDectection" written by Christopher G. Green (@christopherggreen). The package implements the multivariate outlier detection methodology described in Cerioli (2010).
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
